body: now knows that he slept with the wrong sister and she therefore took advantage of the fact that she looks like her sister to sleep with her bf, therefore making it that she's in the wrong. Then the last part is something like "sister you know what this guy just did" "No what happened?" " To me he...." then the bf goes "wait wait wait!" and it ends.

Should be a cheating tag on this one.

The setting is pretty much the girl on the right or the more thicc girl is the guys girlfriend and the other one is her sister, however the sister thinner thinks the bf is cheating on her thicc sister so since they pretty much look the same (not sure if their twins) except that her sister is a bit more chubby and has a much bigger chest. So to prove her bf is a cheater she steals her sisters bikini and then meets up with him an pretends to be her sister. Thinking he could never find out it's her, the bf on the otherhand instantly notices since her chest is much smaller and the bikini is a bit loose. She then leads him to a secluded place and then he say's they usually have sex everywhere and convinces her to have sex there, and she thinking he still thinks it's her sister agree's so to not break her disguise. Then later on they meet up with the thiccer sister who is glad they seem to have reconcile the sister starts to blush realizing the bf
